title: Government (Mayor of Limerick) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Local Government (Mayor of Limerick)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Local Government (Mayor of Limerick) 

and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (Establishment Day) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited local government (mayor limerick) miscellaneous provision act 2024 (establishment day) order 2024

title: Government (Mayor of Limerick) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No.
heading: 2. The 24th day of May 2024 is appointed to be the establishment day for
text_raw:
2. The 24th day of May 2024 is appointed to be the establishment day for 
the purposes of the Local Government (Mayor of Limerick) and Miscellaneous 
Provisions Act 2024 (No. 7 of 2024). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 May, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [233] 3
